lines.text: I fell in love with you before I even met you.
How can you love me? I am not even real. You can't fall in love with a dream.
You're more real to me than anything I've ever known.

[First lines]
Ignorance is bliss. For the first time in my life, I agree.
Hey! What'd you do to the world?
Turned it off.
Never trust a beautiful woman.

[after repeatedly informing McBain throughout the film that he doesn't smoke, Hall fishes a cigarette out of his pack and lights it while being interrogated]
Man, you're picking up bad habits left and right.
Must be the stress.
Then you'll need a carton.

[after shooting David and realizing the truth]
So, is someone gonna unplug me now?
[to Jane]
Do me a favor, will you? When you get back to wherever it is that you come from, just leave us all the hell alone down here, okay?
Of course, we've improved on this model since then, now the players can beat the shit out of, and try to drown one another.
Why are you fucking with our lives?
If you're thinkin' what I think you're thinkin', don't even think about it.
So who's in control?
*Not* us.
Why did you butcher those people?
Because it was fun!
He did it. He jacked in.
Huh? Who's Jack?
I know the truth.
Where are you?
You could call it the end of the world.
We're nothing but a simulation on some computer.
[last lines]
There's so many things I have to tell you about, Doug.
